srcDoc.js:
appsmith.onReady(() => {});
appsmith.onModelChange(newModal => {
  const isSelected = newModal.selected;
  const svg1 = `
		<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 87 1042" preserveAspectRatio="none" fill="none">
			<path
					d="M86 1041V1L70.8714 172.912C60.1469 294.778 36.2182 422.299 1.09639 520.081C0.388306 522.052 0.381538 524.179 1.07713 526.155C36.1668 625.824 60.2778 752.721 71.2755 875.977L86 1041Z"
					fill="url(#paint0_linear_15861_23971)" stroke="url(#paint1_linear_15861_23971)" />
			<defs>
					<linearGradient id="paint0_linear_15861_23971" x1="-4.35293" y1="521" x2="86" y2="521"
							gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
							<stop stop-color="#EEF4FF" />
							<stop offset="1" stop-color="#F9F9F9" />
					</linearGradient>
					<linearGradient id="paint1_linear_15861_23971" x1="0" y1="521" x2="86" y2="521" gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
							<stop stop-color="#5D9AFF" />
							<stop offset="1" stop-color="#F9F9F9" />
					</linearGradient>
			</defs>
	</svg>
	`;
  const svg2 = `
		<svg id="right-arrow" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 86 1040" preserveAspectRatio="none" fill="none">
			<path d="M86 1040V0L70.8714 171.912C60.1469 293.778 36.2182 421.299 1.09639 519.081C0.388306 521.052 0.381538 523.179 1.07713 525.155C36.1668 624.824 60.2778 751.721 71.2755 874.977L86 1040Z" fill="url(#paint0_linear_15861_23042)"/>
			<defs>
				<linearGradient id="paint0_linear_15861_23042" x1="-4.35293" y1="520" x2="86" y2="520" gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
					<stop stop-color="#AAAAAA" stop-opacity="0.15"/>
					<stop offset="1" stop-color="#AEAEAE" stop-opacity="0"/>
				</linearGradient>
			</defs>
		</svg>
	`;
  const container = document.getElementById("svgContainer");
  container.style.height = "724px";
  container.innerHTML = isSelected ? svg1 : svg2;
});

});

appsmith.onModelChange((newModal)=>{
	const isSelected = newModal.selected;

	const svg1 = `
		<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 87 1042" preserveAspectRatio="none" fill="none">
			<path
					d="M86 1041V1L70.8714 172.912C60.1469 294.778 36.2182 422.299 1.09639 520.081C0.388306 522.052 0.381538 524.179 1.07713 526.155C36.1668 625.824 60.2778 752.721 71.2755 875.977L86 1041Z"

							<stop offset="1" stop-color="#F9F9F9" />
					</linearGradient>
					<linearGradient id="paint1_linear_15861_23971" x1="0" y1="521" x2="86" y2="521" gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
							<stop stop-color="#5D9AFF" />
							<stop offset="1" stop-color="#F9F9F9" />

	`

	const svg2 =`
		<svg id="right-arrow" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 86 1040" preserveAspectRatio="none" fill="none">
			<path d="M86 1040V0L70.8714 171.912C60.1469 293.778 36.2182 421.299 1.09639 519.081C0.388306 521.052 0.381538 523.179 1.07713 525.155C36.1668 624.824 60.2778 751.721 71.2755 874.977L86 1040Z" fill="url(#paint0_linear_15861_23042)"/>

					<stop offset="1" stop-color="#AEAEAE" stop-opacity="0"/>

			</defs>
		</svg>

	const container = document.getElementById("svgContainer");
